request.description: List all graded submissions for a specific exam.
View detailed grade including full question payloads, student answers, expected answers, and grading feedback. Admin gets complete breakdown.

response.name: Success Response
response.body:
{
    "success": true,
    "message": "Grade details retrieved successfully",
    "data": {
        "id": 25,
        "student_name": "John Doe",
